attributes.action: Freeze duty on fuel then reduce it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Fuel prices in the UK are now universally above the 100p per litre mark up and down the country. The majority of the cost in the UK is fuel duty, something which is overlooked by politicians as being an issue to the voters that they serve.

It is now time for this government to immediately freeze the duty on fuel and then put in place a reduction of the duty applied to petrol and diesel to consumers and business.
